entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is described as a dangerous dark wizard who was precociously brilliant. He was educated at Durmstrang and devoted himself to the Dark Arts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who arrived later than Grindelwald and stole his crown. He is described as being just as brilliant as Grindelwald.

entities.name: gellert grindelwald
entities.description: Gellert Grindelwald is mentioned as a person who was expelled from Durmstrang at the age of 16 for his twisted experiments.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is described as a school famous for its tolerance of the Dark Arts.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as the location where Grindelwald visited his great-aunt.

relationships.description: Grindelwald and Dumbledore are compared in terms of their brilliance.
